title: Spring Data Interface Projection only works if defined in same repository as used

labels.name: area/spring
labels.description: Issues relating to the Spring integration

body:
### Describe the bug

When using the interface projection feature with the spring data layer, we have this error if we don't define the projection interface in the same repository as used.

```java
java.lang.IllegalAccessError: class org.cnje.kiwi.event.repository.EventEnrollmentRepository_3777848de63326f296cc69059d5e1dc6d2fe63e9Impl$$function$$1 tried to access method 'org.cnje.kiwi.event.dto.query.JuniorWithPlaces_5decffa0b6323520b2fbb38fbc4c77a28b3bbd2f org.cnje.kiwi.event.dto.query.JuniorWithPlaces_5decffa0b6323520b2fbb38fbc4c77a28b3bbd2f.convert_countByEventAndStateIsTrue(java.lang.Object[])' (org.cnje.kiwi.event.repository.EventEnrollmentRepository_3777848de63326f296cc69059d5e1dc6d2fe63e9Impl$$function$$1 and org.cnje.kiwi.event.dto.query.JuniorWithPlaces_5decffa0b6323520b2fbb38fbc4c77a28b3bbd2f are in unnamed module of loader io.quarkus.bootstrap.runner.RunnerClassLoader @7c53a9eb)
```

### Expected behavior

We can define the interface anywhere in the project

### Actual behavior

We can only define it in the same repository as used

### How to Reproduce?

Tested with 2.7.4.Final and 2.7.5.Final

1. Create a project using the spring data extension
2. Create a custom query returning an interface
3. Use it

### Output of `uname -a` or `ver`

_No response_

### Output of `java -version`

_No response_

### GraalVM version (if different from Java)

_No response_

### Quarkus version or git rev

2.7.5.Final

### Build tool (ie. output of `mvnw --version` or `gradlew --version`)

maven 3.8.5

### Additional information

_No response_
